column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=Last month I decided to visit my grandmother .
#text=She lives about three hours away from me , and I do not own a car .
#text=To get to her house safely , I wanted to take a train .
#text=Trains are a very affordable way to travel , and I find them to be comfortable and pleasant .
#text=I got on my computer , and went to the website where people buy train tickets .
#text=I chose a date to leave and I booked my tickets .
#text=My tickets were emailed to me and I printed them off using my printer .
#text=A week later , I went to the train station and boarded the train .
#text=The ride was very quiet , so I took a nap part of the ride .
#text=I went to the cafeteria cart on the train and bought coffee .
#text=I enjoyed the coffee and drank it while looking out the window .
